Average.title: Average
Average.description: This is the Average that was given to you by the user, you are to update the Matric_Average__c field

CandidateId.title: CandidateId

MinimumRequirements.title: MinimumRequirements
MinimumRequirements.description: The User will indicate whether the candidate met minimum requirements for admission to bachelor's degree, diploma or higher certificate? You are to update the Matric_Exemption__c field with this output

Results.title: Results
Results.description: These are the Matric results provided to you by the user, you are to update the Matric_Results__c field with this output Format: Long Text field bullet each subject Example - Subject A: % - Subject B: % - Subject C:
